summary: The Contoso Wireless TV is a high-definition television with built-in Wi-Fi, access to thousands of streaming channels, 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR10+ compatibility, Dolby Atmos sound, and a voice remote control that is compatible with Alexa. It also comes with a one-year warranty and customer service support 24/7. No additional accessories are needed to use the TV, but an HDMI cable and a universal remote control may be purchased for added convenience.
